${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:StunningStrike.NAME: Stunning Strike
${modID}:StunningStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

${modID}:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
${modID}:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Focus. NL Your next Attack is ${modID}:Magic.
${modID}:MagicWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Focus. NL Your next 2 attacks are Magic.

${modID}:FutureStrike.NAME: Future Strike
${modID}:FutureStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Scry equal to unBlocked damage.

${modID}:OpportunityAttack.NAME: Opportunity Attack
${modID}:OpportunityAttack.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Draw 1 card.

${modID}:MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
${modID}:MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. Twice as effective against Block.

${modID}:Bolt.NAME: Bolt
${modID}:Bolt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Magic *Missile into your hand.
${modID}:Bolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! [#7FFF00]Magic[] *Missiles into your hand.

${modID}:PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
${modID}:PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Powers are free this turn. NL You can't gain Block from cards for 2 turns.

${modID}:KnowledgeIsPower.NAME: Knowledge is Power
${modID}:KnowledgeIsPower.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Adventitious. NL Whenever you draw cards, gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:Aetherflow.NAME: Aetherflow
${modID}:Aetherflow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for each *Aether channeled this combat.

${modID}:SteelwindStrike.NAME: Steelwind Strike
${modID}:SteelwindStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:Starstorm.NAME: Starstorm
${modID}:Starstorm.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Channel 3 ${modID}:Aether. NL At the start of your next turn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:EidolonForm.NAME: Eidolon Form
${modID}:EidolonForm.DESCRIPTION: Adventitious. NL At the start of your turn, add 1 card from your draw pile to your hand. NL It becomes ${modID}:Spontaneous.
${modID}:EidolonForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Adventitious. NL Now and at the start of your turn, add 1 card from your draw pile to your hand. NL It becomes ${modID}:Spontaneous.

${modID}:MartialAdept.NAME: Martial Adept
${modID}:MartialAdept.DESCRIPTION: For the rest of the turn, whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, draw !M! card.
${modID}:MartialAdept.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the rest of the turn, whenever you deal unBlocked attack damage, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:IronFist.NAME: Iron Fist
${modID}:IronFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain Block next turn equal to unBlocked damage.

${modID}:RegenerativeBreaking.NAME: Regenerative Breaking
${modID}:RegenerativeBreaking.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL You cannot play any more attacks this turn. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain [E].

${modID}:SnapBack.NAME: SnapBack
${modID}:SnapBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Put one card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

${modID}:ShockingGrasp.NAME: Shocking Grasp
${modID}:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Enemy loses !M! *Strength this turn.

${modID}:Spellstrike.NAME: Spellstrike
${modID}:Spellstrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage for each Aether channeled this combat.

${modID}:WitchBolt.NAME: Witch Bolt
${modID}:WitchBolt.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Take 1 damage. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Sunbeam.NAME: Sunbeam
${modID}:Sunbeam.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Channel 1 ${modID}:Aether. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ZephyrStrike.NAME: Zephyr Strike
${modID}:ZephyrStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${modID}:Soulrend.NAME: Soulrend
${modID}:Soulrend.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Blood: Gain 1 extra orb slot.

${modID}:Earthquake.NAME: Earthquake
${modID}:Earthquake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Twice as effective against Block.

${modID}:Quadrature.NAME: Quadrature
${modID}:Quadrature.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. NL Deal X damage to all enemies X times. Deal damage an additional time based on your Focus.

${modID}:Advantage.NAME: Advantage
${modID}:Advantage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card.

${modID}:MindOverMatter.NAME: Mind over Matter
${modID}:MindOverMatter.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Lose all *Strength. NL Gain *Focus equal to lost *Strength (positive or negative).

${modID}:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
${modID}:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain this Block an additional time for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:PurgeThought.NAME: Purge Thought
${modID}:PurgeThought.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 hit point. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain *Focus equal to its cost.

${modID}:StepOfTheWind.NAME: Step of the Wind
${modID}:StepOfTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:FastCast.NAME: Fast Cast
${modID}:FastCast.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Evoke your rightmost orb. NL Draw !M! card.
${modID}:FastCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spontaneous. NL Evoke your rightmost orb. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:GuardianBlade.NAME: Guardian Blade
${modID}:GuardianBlade.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack this turn is ${modID}:Magic.

${modID}:ActionSurge.NAME: Action Surge
${modID}:ActionSurge.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if you have no energy. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ActionSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if you have no energy. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
